testcase.name: Validate if place is being added successfully
testcase.system-out: Given Add Place Payload with "Tata House" "English-IN" "Juhu Scheme, Mumbai".passed When User calls "addPlaceAPI" with "POST" http request......................passed Then The API call got success with status code 200..........................passed And "status" in response body is "OK".......................................passed And "scope" in response body is "APP".......................................passed And validate place_Id created maps to "Tata House" using "getPlaceAPI"......passed

testcase.name: Validate if delete place functionality is working
testcase.system-out: Given Delete place payload..................................................passed When User calls "deletePlaceAPI" with "POST" http request...................passed Then The API call got success with status code 200..........................passed And "status" in response body is "OK".......................................passed
